website_summaries.verdict: An affordable lip plumper that includes antioxidants as well as collagen, herbs, and vitamins to keep lips healthy and lock in moisture.
pros: A non-sticky lip gloss with a mild plumping action
Smooths out lips and adds a high shine
Comes in a wide range of shades
Also available as a versatile clear gloss for layering over any lipstick without changing the shade
cons: Some problems with the tube leaking

customer_reviews.title: Great gloss, just doesn’t do what’s advertised
customer_reviews.text: I 109% love this lip gloss. It’s gives your lips a beautiful shine, and doesn’t feel too thick or sticky. It literally does nothing to plump your lips, so if that’s why you’re interested, this isn’t the product for you. still a great gloss
customer_reviews.author: T Ray

customer_reviews.title: Glossy but no plump
customer_reviews.text: I love the shine but not seeing any plumping going on or feeling the tingle/burn I have felt with other plumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spencer

customer_reviews.title: So good I had to buy more!!
customer_reviews.text: Great plumper without overdoing it. Beautiful color, and goes with everything, and everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: tranquil peas

customer_reviews.title: Great lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was a good product. However, I did find that it would sometimes leak, but other than that it’s a great lipgloss. It’s not sticky, the applicator brush is soft and glides on your lips, and it makes your lips tingle :)
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this lip gloss would be pretty good. It is very sticky and mine actually leaked in my purse. I will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: JustSomeChick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very much plumping but it smells like cupcakes and is very shiny
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Williams

customer_reviews.title: No plump effect
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... except for how it leaks down into the lid. Kinda messy but pretty shine. It does not plump your lips like advertised
customer_reviews.author: SunneeBooh

customer_reviews.title: Plumping
customer_reviews.text: I do not see a lot of difference on my lips when I use it it is supposed to plump your lips
customer_reviews.author: Life is a Journey

customer_reviews.title: Great, but no longer available
customer_reviews.text: My mother had given me this lip gloss. When I was running low was very glad Amazon carried it, bought 2....bummed its no longer available. Please get it back
customer_reviews.author: MM Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't plump.
customer_reviews.text: I live this lip gloss. Feels great on the lips. Doesn't plump. Bought three different colors
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Nava

customer_reviews.title: Plumpless
customer_reviews.text: Goes in smooth and is a great color but it doesn't really 'plump' up my lips. I've tried other plumpers that worked like magic but this one just didn't stand up to my expectations. Still a nice gloss though.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney Germann

customer_reviews.title: the only thing this did was tingle for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: the only thing this did was tingle for a few seconds then dried up quickly leaving my lips more chapped than they were to start with
customer_reviews.author: Celina Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: It does really plump your lips
customer_reviews.text: I just loved it the color the shine the plump great product highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hilliker

customer_reviews.title: More like a normal clear gloss
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as other plumpers I've tried. More like a normal clear gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Andry Alonis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best lipgloss I’ve pirchased for the price and I buy a lot. Make lips look so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't plump
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice any plumping but i just bought it because I needed a clear gloss, super shiny and nice texture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my color I picked...but I don't notice any "plumping". Lots of shine!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth B

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks luscious on your lips!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and it works well with my skin tone, it is smooth and the color stays all day Good stuff!😊
customer_reviews.author: Judy2605

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make a difference with my lips
customer_reviews.text: I like them glossy look , but doesn’t plump my lips!
customer_reviews.author: IRINA LIASHEDKO

customer_reviews.title: I got this & I have been Disappointed in it's performance It doesn't do what it says
customer_reviews.text: I got this & I have been Disappointed in it's performance It doesn't do what it says.No Plumping at all😐
customer_reviews.author: Sandi W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t plump your lips but it does make them look nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the applicator and the color is lighter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not plump at all. Basically a glorified lip gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good gloss, but...
customer_reviews.text: This acted as a really nice clear gloss, but it didn't plump my lips at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ani Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip gloss of all times! Used to be a Dior girl.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: the lipgloss is great and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Although it doesn’t work as a lip plumper AT ALL, the lipgloss is great and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: I love it its not sticky at all
customer_reviews.text: I wear this is every day!I love it its not sticky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: idk it was a weird lighter pink. not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: troytoria1

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice but it dries quickly. For most people reapplying isn't a problem so it's overall very well-rounded.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: l like it too much
customer_reviews.text: Colors: I have Honey, which is a great everyday neutral, although I do wish it was a wee less pink and a bit more neutral. Adore is a great bold, wine-colored fall shade. And Smitten is a very wearable hot pink...which I know sounds like a contradiction in terms, but I'm a redhead who can pull it off (and redheads can rarely swing a hot pink lip). Even my mother can pull this one off without looking wacky. Romantic was a bit of a disappointment for me, as I was hoping for a classic red, but this one is too orangey and unflattering on my skin tone Overall, for the price, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pan yanwei

customer_reviews.title: Color could be better
customer_reviews.text: Application is smooth, but a tad sticky and the color is more of a light grayish mauve.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: My favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip glosses! Just wish they had a tint of decent flavor to them. But it’s nice they have no flavor too, so they don’t taste disgusting. Just enough shine & they stay in place to keep my lips super moisturized. Wish application was easier tho. They do get messy and I’m scared to keep in my purse on its side.
customer_reviews.author: jamie zarkovacski

customer_reviews.title: Plump it up
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and the taste isn't bad (as some always ends up in my mouth after applying). I definitely see a difference in my lips after applying, they are plumper. I am happy with this product. I also think it is a great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glowing natural color and great moisturization!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glowing natural color and keeps your lips moisturized for a long time during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff ! Not sure why Sally’s does not sell no more
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product not really as described. Thick, and gives more of an uncomfortable burn to the lips than plumping. Glad it was cheap so I dont regret spending a lot on it.
customer_reviews.author: Newness

customer_reviews.title: That I can still get my all time favorite lip gloss.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has a brush applicator instead of those awful dabber type ends that are the most common. It is also a plumper, and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this is simply a lip gloss, not a lip plumper
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: 🤔
customer_reviews.text: Didnt plump my lips its jut made my lips tickle
customer_reviews.author: Christina Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Like it and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Like it and feels great! Only downside is the the brush you apply with gets frayed after few times and the parts of brush that stick out rub the shine outside your lip onto your face...
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Go-To Lip Gloss
customer_reviews.text: My go-to lip gloss. Versatile and good for the price. I'm nobody's MUA diva, but this does the trick for me all year.
customer_reviews.author: C_Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine but not great at plumping
customer_reviews.text: This gloss is fine over lipstick but other brands I have used are better at plumping. Not the best product I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: CaroBee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and it's a light shade, but very pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: lyndajean23

product_meta.title: Palladio Plump 'n' Shine Lip Gloss, Acaiya Later
product_meta.description: Color:Acaiya LaterMoisturize your lips while wearing the perfect color to match your outfit with Plump 'N' Shine Lip Gloss Acaiya Later from Palladio. Created more than 25 years ago, Palladio is renowned for its line of color cosmetics enriched with herbs and vitamins. Fashioned for women with all types of skin, Palladio helps you look radiant while helping protect your skin from the signs of aging. With a diverse selection of products and shade availability, Palladio allows you to create the variety of looks you desire.
feature_bullets: Ingredients are absorbed instantly into the lips and begin plumping on contact
Aloe Vera and Vitamin E maintain hydration of lips
Country of origin is United States
